::::SendMLDMessage

proc  ::::SendMLDMessage { args }
################################################################# Procedure Name: GetMLDMessage Description: This proc is used either an mld report or an mld done. Input args: args IMPORTANT!!!!!! Because some of the IXIA adapters only have for UDF fields if is necessary to force the 3rd and 4th word to be all zeros Output args: None. Return value: MLD Messages in ixia raw frame format Typical usage: set MLDMsg [GetMLDMessage $frame] Category Types (Setup,GetSwitchInfo,SendTraffic,CaptureTraffic, VerifySwitchOutput,VerifyTraffic) Category: SendTraffic #################################################################
